item.title: Trump Is Undermining Trust in Official Economic Statistics. China Shows Where That Path Can Lead
item.description: China demonstrates how manipulating economic data can ultimately erode government credibility.

item.title: Inside the Summit Where China Pitched Its AI Agenda to the World
item.description: Behind closed doors, Chinese researchers are laying the groundwork for a new global AI agenda—without input from the US.

item.title: US Senator Urges DHS to Probe Whether Agents Were Moved From Criminal Cases to Deportations
item.description: US Senator Ron Wyden is demanding that the Department of Homeland Security investigate reports of agents being reassigned to bolster immigration enforcement.

item.title: Congress Passes GENIUS Act in Major Win for US Crypto Industry
item.description: Experts say the legislation could unleash a tidal wave of new stablecoins—and fresh complaints about President Trump’s crypto entanglements.
